from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from typing import List

class MsSparkUtils:
    """Class supporting mssparkutils operations"""

    def list_directory_contents(self, path: str):
        """
        Lists the contents of a directory

        Arguments:
            path (String): Directory to get contents from
        Returns:
            List of FileInfo objects
        """        
        return mssparkutils.fs.ls(path)

    def move_directory(self, from_path: str, to_path: str):
        """
        Moves a file or directory

        Arguments:
            from_path (String): Location of item to move from
            to_path (String): Location of time to move to
        Returns:
            Boolean for success or failure            
        """                
        return mssparkutils.fs.mv(from_path, to_path, overwrite=True)

    def delete_directory(self, path: str, recurse: bool = False):
        """
        Removes a file or directory

        Arguments:
            path (String): Location of file or directory to delete
            recurse (Boolean): Recursive query value to delete nested filess or directories  
        Returns:
            Boolean for success or failure            
        """          
        return mssparkutils.fs.rm(path, recurse)
    
    def replace(self, from_path: str, to_path: str):
        """
        Copies a file into given location; overwrites file if already exists.
        Removes original file source location.

        Arguments:
            from_path (String): Location of item to get 
            to_path (String): Location of item to replace           
        """                
        return mssparkutils.fs.mv(from_path, to_path, overwrite=True)        
        mssparkutils.fs.cp(from_path, to_path)
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(from_path)


    def does_path_exist(self, path: str):
        """
        Verifies if folder path or full file name exists.

        Arguments:
            path (String): Folder path or full file name.
        Returns:
            Boolean, if exists true else false
        """            
        return mssparkutils.fs.exists(path)
